title: Ticket #6674: condor_qedit wont let queue super edit protected attributes
description:
ticket #5889 changed condor_qedit so it checks for attempts to change immutable/protected/secure attributes before allows them to be changed. But the tools don't necessarily have the same config as the schedd, and in any case, queue super users are still allowed to change protected attributes.

condor_qedit should be changed to go ahead and try and change job attributes, and then only check for immutable/protected/secure when it gets a 'no-access' failure code.

You can work around this by configuring it so that only the schedd sees the PROTECTED_JOB_ATTRS knob 

config fragment
SCHEDD.PROTECTED_JOB_ATTRS = Attr1, Attr2

Or alternately, clear the list for the tool 

alternate config fragment
TOOL.PROTECTED_JOB_ATTRS =
